name: Don't Text and Drive
description:
Don't Text and Drive is a challenging single-player horror game where you text for help as you are driving.

On your way home, you hear something in the backseat. Not expecting anything, only to see a pair of eyes looking at you. But he's not the only one. You are unable to exit the car so you need to text your family and friends, to help you in any way they can.
